channel.title: Visual Basic on Life Reboot
channel.description: Recent content in Visual Basic on Life Reboot

item.title: How I Learned to Love Go (Language) And Stop Worrying
item.description: There’s a new love in my life, and she’s petite, versatile, responsive and modern - it’s the language, Go. I’m still in the honeymoon stage, getting to know the ways she likes to play and the things she can do for me, but I can tell you now - it’s going to be a long romance.
